# LOA

```{r}
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)
library(flextable)
library(ftExtra)

set_flextable_defaults(float = "float")

read_csv("_acronyms.csv") %>% 
  arrange(short, .locale = "en") %>% 
  flextable() %>% 
  theme_box() %>%
  border_remove() %>%
  delete_part("header") %>%
  align(align = "left", part = "all") %>%
  autofit() %>%
  bold(j = 1)
```
